hadiths.text: It was narrated that Aishah said:"The Messenger of Allah performed Tawaf around the Kabah during the farewell pilgrimeage on a camel, touching the Corner with his crooked-ended stick." (Sahih) Chpater 141. Tawaf For The One Who Is Performing Hajj Al-Ifrad

chapter.eng-name: Performing Tawaf Around The House On A Mount
